name: Jerry (WuzzyWizard)
description:
Beat ur way through an office building to take revenge on the all the people who bullied u cuz u where born with out a mustach (this is not acually in the game) saw suppose to be a cut scene

so get to the last big guy and beat him up

PS dont walk backwards in the map ;)

This game is by no means finished and the is no win condition but its a litle bit of fun at least XD  

It has the boss req for the jam, it dosent have any theme related things tho, the plan was to make a whole story and cutsences and shit about the main character being on the edge then get pushed over it metaforically speaking.

but i didnt manage, i just dicided i wanted to post this failure
